textAfterTable: Career Honors & Awards League Honor Description Texas League (AA) All-Star Team 2011 Movements & Injuries 2015 4/19/2015 Missed 11 games (left knee surgery). 4/05/2015 Left knee surgery, 15-day DL (retroactive to March 27th, 2015). 1/31/2015 Re-signed by the Los Angeles Angels of Anaheim to a one-year contract. 2014 11/03/2014 Missed the last 37 regular season and all 3 playoff games (left knee injury). 10/02/2014 Did not make the Los Angeles Angels of Anaheim playoff roster (injured). 8/21/2014 Left knee injury, 60-day DL. 2013 8/28/2013 Missed 3 games (right forearm injury). 8/24/2013 Right forearm injury, day-to-day. 6/05/2013 Missed 2 games (sprained left ankle). 6/03/2013 Sprained left ankle, day-to-day. 3/02/2013 Re-signed by the Los Angeles Angels to a one-year contract. 2012 8/22/2012 Recalled from Salt Lake (AAA). 8/02/2012 Optioned to Salt Lake (AAA). 7/17/2012 Recalled
